body.name: Chicco Bravo For2 Standing/Sitting Double Stroller, Iron
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 19 hrs 49 mins
features: Accommodates 2 children: front seat + Back seat/platform for big kids to ride or stand
Front seat folds forward to accept Chicco Key Fit or Fit2 car seat, and includes 5-point harness, adjustable canopy, and detachable child tray
Bonus back seat includes 3-point harness and folds up to make room for standing.Periodically wipe clean plastic parts with a soft damp cloth
Standing platform features easy-grip handles and backrest
Innovative fold/carry handle for a one-hand, free-standing, ultra-compact quick fold. Rear wheel diameter - 9 inches
body.description: For younger children, The Chicco BravoFor2 standing/sitting double stroller features a traditional padded stroller seat, five-point harness, large adjustable canopy, and removable tray with two cup holders. For infants, The stroller seat folds forward to accept a Chicco Key Fit or Fit2 infant car seat with easy click-in attachment. (Sold separately)for older siblings, the BravoFor2 is outfitted with a bonus back seat and platform where big kids can choose to sit or stand. The seat folds away easily When unoccupied and includes a three-point harness for security. Easy-grip handles provide added stability for standing and a backrest gives extra support.The BravoFor2 is designed with a one-hand, ultra-compact quick fold for easier maneuvering and storage. An integrated handle easily activates the fold and simultaneously rotates the front wheels inward to keep the folded unit standing. Once the stroller is closed, The fold handle also doubles as a carry handle. Treaded rubber tires, full suspension, and front swivels help maintain a smooth ride for both passengers in every configuration. One-touch brakes keep the stroller in place when parked. A padded push-handle, parent tray with two cup holders, and large storage basket with front and rear access provide added convenience for mom or dad.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: One-Hand Fold Dual fold and carry handle is easy to reach and activate for a convenient quick fold. Bonus Rear Seat Rear seat accommodates second rider and folds away to make room for standing. Parent Tray Two cup holders and zippered storage compartment keep essentials close at hand. Child Tray Main stroller seat includes a detachable child tray with two cup holders. Kid-Sized Storage Storage pocket makes it easy to carry along big kid necessities for strolls in standing mode. Rubber Tires Treaded tires offer a smooth ride and are designed to resist wear over time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ease of use
reviews.reviewText: This stroller is amazing and honestly my favorite! Bought this for my 4th child and toddler duo, my car seat (Chico fit2) clicks right in so easy, while my toddler can easy get to her seat in the back. It takes just a simple turn to fold and unfold. Definitely a bang for the buck.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy to use for two
reviews.reviewText: Upon receipt, the stroller was easy to put together (though I was missing a washer to one of the back wheels). Took me no more than 15 minutes. My 4 year old hated our other attachments to ride on in our other double. He couldn’t sit, didn’t have anything to hold while standing.. and so he walked until I eventually had to hold him and push.Not with the Bravo though! The sitting assembly is amazing for either one of my two (2 year old or 4 year old) and the standing assembly is great because either can hold onto something (handles) while being pushed. Wishing I had bought this years ago! Just buy it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would buy again
reviews.reviewText: We really like this stroller. We have a newborn and a 3 year old. We took this stroller on a week long camping trip to a local fair. It worked well it could use more storage underneath but the toddler seat just makes it hard to get things in and out. It’s very heavy lol easy enough to fold up but lord it’s heavy. It’s a double stroller essentially so it’s easy enough to maneuver around but it’s still kind of a boat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars unbeatable value in double strollers
reviews.reviewText: Great double stroller, particularly for the price. Our 2 year old loves the choice to stand or sit while the baby is in the front in the car seat. Can't beat the click in keyfit30 for under 6 months! Also love that it maintains the one handed fold. Cons: the 2nd rear facing seat has no back, so 2nd child must be able to reliably sit on own; therefore ideal for toddler/baby 2 toddler combo. The cup holders don't fit any of our thermoses or water bottles (contigo and camelbak); neither does our regular chicco bravo stroller and I am dissapointed with that feature in both. But overall, with the only complaint being cupholder sizing, this is clearly an excellent stroller overall!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This stroller is perfect for my growing family. I have a 2 year old and she lost interest quickly in sitting in her stroller. So the fact that she can stand on this is perfect. There are little hand holders for her to hold on to something while on the road. It’s very easy to fold, you literally click one button. And I love this car seat! It is so light. Also the little undercarriage is a nice size and fits my bag perfectly. Prior to this one I had the britax bsafe car seat and stroller and I hated it everything about.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and great for an older toddler.
reviews.reviewText: I love how easy this is to fold and unfold I also love that my infant car seat is able to click into the frame. My toddler loves the standing and ride feature. She feels like such a big girl. This is perfect for my infant and 3-year-old while on the go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and very maneuverable
reviews.reviewText: Easily the best double stroller out there. We had the normal bravo with our first child and when the second came along this was exactly what we needed. Folds super easy, reasonable weight for a double stroller. Extremely compact when open vs competition. Extra storage is there but barely handles a small diaper bag. Happy to trade that for the compactness and maneuverability this stroller offers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best stroller for two
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this stroller.I’m completely happy with it . My son was 4 when I got it. My daughter was a newborn. It’s very strong . Has a clean look to it and definitely going to last me . My son who is over 40 pounds and is pretty tall for his age fit in the toddler seat just fine . My daughters car seat fits in perfectly . I have also used the front chair with the food tray . Although it doesn’t recline all the way back it reclines just enough that each child has room .Best decision ever getting this stroller.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente opción para hijos en edades similares
reviews.reviewText: Carriola de buenos materiales, fácil de armar y desarmar, el único detalle negativo que tiene es su gran tamaño extendida, que la silla tiene límite de movimiento y solo puede ser usada por niños mayores a 1 año de edad a menos de que se compre por separado la cuna de viaje

La mejor carreola doble! Es muy cómoda, practica, y de muy buena calidad en todo incluidos los detalles. Mi hijo de 3 años va feliz en la parte de atrás ya sea sentado o de pie y mi bebé seguro adelante. Es muy fácil doblarla y no ocupa mucho espacio. Es muy fácil de manejar y tiene los espacios perfectos para que yo pueda trae mi café y mis cosas en la sección especial de arriba, la bolsa de abajo es muy amplia. Ya habíamos comprado otra doble antes pero la cambiamos por esta por qué la anterior era muy pesada y estorbosa.
It's very useful for baby and toddler!
Igual a la foto, llego en buen estado, a tiempo y protegida, las piezas completas y sin daño.Buena compra !

Lo único que no me gusto es que el asiento de adelante no se puede reclinar y eso será un problema cuando mi bebé crezca y se duerma, lo que hacen la mayoría de los niños pequeños cuando viajan en carriola, lo que me hace pensar que tendré que comprar otra en cuanto ya no quepa en el huevito pero la entrega excelente
